meanings.sent1: The doctor gently touched the sternums to check for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent2: She felt pain in her sternums after the accident.
meanings.sent3: The sternums of the skeleton seemed to be chatting with each other.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work was the sternums of his success.
meanings.sent5: The sternums, like a shield, protected the heart.
